First the OOC part. I have created a new RPG, yes I know that I tried that =
once before. This one has nothing to do with Transformers. It deals more in=
, well Vampires. It's called Sunnydale by Night, and any of you who watch B=
uffy, know what Sunnydale is. So anyway, do me a favor and check it out, yo=
u might like it.
http://sunnydalenight.tripod.com/sunnydalebynight

The non=
 OOC Part--

::Vukodlak::

    The time of his awakening was at hand. Soon =
would he ba able to destroy all of his enimies. (All what? None of them?) S=
oon would his time reign supreme.

::Battera/Dachande::

    "Ready to go b=
ack into the Sulaco?" Dachande asked.
    "Well, sure, but just because he =
said to." Battera replied, as though being with Dachande was a chore.
    "=
Who said?" Dachande asked, still wondering what had happened to her after s=
he was sucked into the earth.
    "The Dark Master," Battera said. Then she=
 relized what she had said, and added. "Gator"
